name: Heaven's Halberd
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

descriptions.name: Disarm
descriptions.description: Prevents a target from attacking for 3.0 seconds on melee targets, and 5.0 seconds on ranged targets.Range: 600

descriptions.name: Lesser Maim
descriptions.description: Each attack has a 35% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -20% and attack speed by -20 if the user is melee. Reduces enemy hero movement by -10% and attack speed by -10 if the user is ranged. Effect lasts 5.0 seconds.
